channel.title: I need help starting a client and a server
channel.description: hi everyone i have been on this site for about 8 minutes lol and i want to go ahead and learn how to do this do i need any type of programs and can someone help me with a client and server it would really mean a lot thanks :confused: [flash=200,200][/flash]

item.title: I need help starting a client and a server
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“rs3andfsu, post:5, topic:281163”]ok thanks pkakidjr1 this is pretty helpful[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 05:28:07 pm[/size][hr]i got 1 tiny problem it says this when i try to compile or run the server

you dont have jdk 6.0 or jdk 5.0

but i have jdk6.13
and file name is
jdk-6u13-javafx-1_1_1-windows-i586

and its on my desktop but im not sure what to do sorry for bothering you[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2009, 05:43:44 pm[/size][hr]sent you an invitation bob[/quote]well since you added me on msn ill help fix it later

Read full topic

item.title: I need help starting a client and a server
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“rs3andfsu, post:3, topic:281163”]ok well ive read that already and i decided that none of that stuff would probably not help me so i decided to umm try and see if i could like make some stuff of my own and i think it was a good idea but it has some flaws and i dont know what they or how to fix them so can you like download what i got so far and see whats wrong with it or get someone who would be willing to help me with “DoomDragonScape” because i seriously dont know what im doing idk how to make it local or get anything besides pics models and ip addresses rest of the other stuff i just downloaded from some website this guy gave to me and said to edit it and make it my own and if i took 4 hours to just get 1-46800 models from runescape which took me 1 1/2 hours just to figure out how to do that im gonna cry and i also im only 12 so that stuff at the site you gave me makes no sense to me at all and i made my own background and i have no freakin idea what do with this and im about to give up[/quote]You’re an idiot then because thats what you need to code.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 01, 2009, 08:12:14 pm[/size][hr][quote=“rs3andfsu, post:3, topic:281163”]ok well ive read that already and i decided that none of that stuff would probably not help me so i decided to umm try and see if i could like make some stuff of my own and i think it was a good idea but it has some flaws and i dont know what they or how to fix them so can you like download what i got so far and see whats wrong with it or get someone who would be willing to help me with “DoomDragonScape” because i seriously dont know what im doing idk how to make it local or get anything besides pics models and ip addresses rest of the other stuff i just downloaded from some website this guy gave to me and said to edit it and make it my own and if i took 4 hours to just get 1-46800 models from runescape which took me 1 1/2 hours just to figure out how to do that im gonna cry and i also im only 12 so that stuff at the site you gave me makes no sense to me at all and i made my own background and i have no freakin idea what do with this and im about to give up[/quote]46800 models? Thats basically starting blank,and only about 50 out of the 350k people on here have done that sucsesfully, add me on MSN
pure69m0nk@hotmail.com
I’ll help you here’s the best begining source,
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,284690.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: I need help starting a client and a server
item.dc:creator: @rs3andfsu rs3andfsu
item.description:
@rs3andfsu wrote:

ok well ive read that already and i decided that none of that stuff would probably not help me so i decided to umm try and see if i could like make some stuff of my own and i think it was a good idea but it has some flaws and i dont know what they or how to fix them so can you like download what i got so far and see whats wrong with it or get someone who would be willing to help me with “DoomDragonScape” because i seriously dont know what im doing idk how to make it local or get anything besides pics models and ip addresses rest of the other stuff i just downloaded from some website this guy gave to me and said to edit it and make it my own and if i took 4 hours to just get 1-46800 models from runescape which took me 1 1/2 hours just to figure out how to do that im gonna cry and i also im only 12 so that stuff at the site you gave me makes no sense to me at all and i made my own background and i have no freakin idea what do with this and im about to give up

Read full topic
item.source: I need help starting a client and a server

item.title: I need help starting a client and a server
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

rs3andfsu:

hi everyone i have been on this site for about 8 minutes lol and i want to go ahead and learn how to do this do i need any type of programs and can someone help me with a client and server it would really mean a lot thanks [flash=200,200][/flash]

Well you need to learn Java first, here’s where I started off, read all this word for word for about 3 days maybe reading it 1-2 hours a days, thats how I learned it!
http://java.sun.com/docs/codeconv/html/CodeConvTOC.doc.html

Read full topic
